regen.absent_element: handling of processor reset after failure to reset watchdog timer
regen.new_specification: The system shall handle the processor reset generated by the failure to reset the watchdog timer within the allotted time and ensure Continuous BIT operations resume correctly after the reset.

regen.absent_element: handling of faults or errors during Continuous BIT operation
regen.new_specification: The system shall handle faults or errors encountered during Continuous BIT operation and ensure that the watchdog timer is reset within the allotted time to prevent a processor reset.

regen.absent_element: handling of transient faults during Continuous BIT execution
regen.new_specification: The system shall handle transient faults during Continuous BIT execution, ensuring that the watchdog timer is reset within the allotted time to prevent processor reset.

label: Continuous BIT shall take less than 3 milliseconds while processing faults.
